EmailTemplate.subject: AeroVue Touch and Integrated Panel
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for attending our recent SocialFlight webinar “AeroVue Touch and Integrated Panel”. In a few days, we will have this posted online for on-demand viewing and will send you the link.
As a seminar special, we are offering a 10% discount on our products when you secure your products through our free My Avionics <[[https://apps.apple.com/us/app/my-avionics/id1367559967]]> app found on the App Store for iPhone and iPad products. Easy to use; download the app and upload a photo of your panel or take a photo through the app, complete the information and you’ll receive a 10% discount in your inbox!
As we mentioned in the presentation, our AeroVue Touch <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerovue-touch]]> PFD/MFD display is a simple and powerful. It comes standard with all flight indicators, the industry-leading SmartView synthetic vision, a vertical situation display that shows flight path over terrain, and ADS-B In weather and traffic. The HeliVue Touch package is built around this display, specifically for helicopters.
If you’re not sure of where to start with an upgrade, contact us <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/contact-us]]>. We’re happy to listen, make recommendations and help you find a dealer/installer. And to discuss the AeroVue Touch for helicopters in our HeliVue Touch, please email me: simon.williams2@honeywell.com <[[mailto:simon.williams2@honeywell.com?subject=AeroVue Touch and Integrated Panel]]>
For more information about the other products discussed with the AeroVue Touch during the webinar, please visit these pages:
- AeroNav GPS Navigators <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeronav-gps-navigation]]>: Slide-in touchscreen replacement for legacy GNS 430, 530 - AeroCruze 100 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerocruze-100]]>: Affordable autopilot offered in three convenient form factors - AeroCruze 230 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerocruze-230]]>: Touchscreen autopilot packed with features - AeroFlight <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeroflight]]>: Compact digital attitude indicator - AeroPoint 200 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeropoint-200]]>: TSO’d as primary instrument for single engine aircraft - AeroPoint 300 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeropoint-300]]>: Designed for twin-engine aircraft, with pre-wired harness - Confidence Plan <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/productitems/bendixking-confidence-plan]]>: Insurance plan for your new avionics - Total Avionics Plan (TAP) <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/pages/total-avionics-plan]]>: Unique alternative in financing your new panel as a subscription
If you have any feedback or questions, please email us at sales@bendixking.com <[[mailto:sales@bendixking.com]]>
Sincerely, Simon Williams BendixKing
